titles.title: Students Helping Young Students Act of 2022
Students Helping Young Students Act of 2022
To amend the Higher Education Act of 1965, to add a work-study program for off-campus community service at selected after-school activities, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

bill.summary:
Students Helping Young Students Act of 2022
This bill expands the federal work-study programs at institutions of higher education to include work-study programs that compensate students employed in the educational after-school, before-school, or out-of-school community service activities of public elementary or secondary schools.
